name: Janna

sources.import_notes: Generated baseline canonical champion file from From Online dataset.

notes: Ability effects are intentionally minimal placeholders until scripted modeling is added.

passive.name: Tailwind
passive.description: Innate: Nearby allied champions gain  bonus movement speed while moving toward  Janna.

basic_ability_1.name: Howling Gale
basic_ability_1.description: Active:  Janna summons a whirlwind at her current location that matures over a short time, increasing its range, speed, damage, and knock up duration.
basic_ability_1.description_source:
The initial cast and the manual recast count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as  Spellblade and triggering  Force Pulse's passive.
The storm does not interact with enemy units that stand on top of it while it is charging.

basic_ability_2.name: Zephyr
basic_ability_2.description: Passive:  Janna gains  bonus movement speed and becomes permanently  ghosted.
basic_ability_2.description_source:
The maximum slow (99%) is reached with 1316.67 / 1250 / 1183.33 / 1116.67 / 1050 ability power.
If the target becomes  untargetable,  dies, or is too far away or no longer in  sight during the cast time, this ability will cancel but does not go on  cooldown nor pay its cost (if applicable).

basic_ability_3.name: Eye of the Storm
basic_ability_3.description: Passive: Whenever  Janna's abilities  slow or  knock up at least one enemy  champion, she  refunds a portion of  Eye of the Storm's cooldown.
basic_ability_3.description_source:
Eye of the Storm has a  forgiveness radius of 175 units.
Janna receives kill credit on enemy champions that are killed by turrets shielded by Eye of the Storm.
Allied turrets will benefit from the bonus attack damage when targeted by Eye of the Storm.
